verses.verse: And, behold, there <S%H935>came<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> out of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> unto <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%>: and <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> by the <S%H4196>altar<s%> to burn <S%H6999>incense<s%>.

And he <S%H7121>cried<s%> against the <S%H4196>altar<s%> in the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, O <S%H4196>altar<s%>, <S%H4196>altar<s%>, thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; Behold, a <S%H1121>child<s%> shall be <S%H3205>born<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> by <S%H8034>name<s%>; and upon thee shall he <S%H2076>offer<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> of the high <S%H1116>places<s%> that burn <S%H6999>incense<s%> upon thee, and <S%H120>men's<s%> <S%H6106>bones<s%> shall be <S%H8313>burnt<s%> upon thee.

And he <S%H5414>gave<s%> a <S%H4159>sign<s%> the same <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, This is the <S%H4159>sign<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%>; Behold, the <S%H4196>altar<s%> shall be <S%H7167>rent<s%>, and the <S%H1880>ashes<s%> that are upon it shall be poured <S%H8210>out<s%>.

And it came to pass, when <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1697>saying<s%> of the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, which had <S%H7121>cried<s%> against the <S%H4196>altar<s%> in <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%>, that he put <S%H7971>forth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> from the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Lay <S%H8610>hold<s%> on him. And his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, which he put <S%H7971>forth<s%> against him, dried <S%H3001>up<s%>, so that he <S%H3201>could<s%> not pull it in <S%H7725>again<s%> to him.

The <S%H4196>altar<s%> also was <S%H7167>rent<s%>, and the <S%H1880>ashes<s%> poured <S%H8210>out<s%> from the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, according to the <S%H4159>sign<s%> which the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H5414>given<s%> by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H2470>Intreat<s%> now the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H6419>pray<s%> for me, that my <S%H3027>hand<s%> may be restored me <S%H7725>again<s%>. And the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2470%H6440>besought<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> was restored him <S%H7725>again<s%>, and became as it was <S%H7223>before<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> unto the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H935>Come<s%> <S%H1004>home<s%> with me, and <S%H5582>refresh<s%> thyself, and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> thee a <S%H4991>reward<s%>.

And the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>, If thou wilt <S%H5414>give<s%> me <S%H2677>half<s%> thine <S%H1004>house<s%>, I will not go <S%H935>in<s%> with thee, neither will I <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> nor <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> in this <S%H4725>place<s%>:

For so was it <S%H6680>charged<s%> me by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H398>Eat<s%> no <S%H3899>bread<s%>, nor <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%>, nor turn <S%H7725>again<s%> by the same <S%H1870>way<s%> that thou <S%H1980>camest<s%>.
So he <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%>, and <S%H7725>returned<s%> not by the <S%H1870>way<s%> that he <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%>.

¶ Now there <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> <S%H259>an<s%> <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H5030>prophet<s%> in <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%>; and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H5608>told<s%> him all the <S%H4639>works<s%> that the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> in <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%>: the <S%H1697>words<s%> which he had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>, them they <S%H5608>told<s%> also to their <S%H1>father<s%>.

And their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> unto them, What <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> he? For his <S%H1121>sons<s%> had <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H335>what<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%>, which <S%H935>came<s%> from <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.
And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, <S%H2280>Saddle<s%> me the <S%H2543>ass<s%>. So they <S%H2280>saddled<s%> him the <S%H2543>ass<s%>: and he <S%H7392>rode<s%> thereon,

And <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H4672>found<s%> him <S%H3427>sitting<s%> under an <S%H424>oak<s%>: and he <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Art thou the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> that <S%H935>camest<s%> from <S%H3063>Judah<s%>? And he <S%H559>said<s%>, I am.
Then he <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H3212>Come<s%> <S%H1004>home<s%> with me, and <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, I <S%H3201>may<s%> not <S%H7725>return<s%> with thee, nor go <S%H935>in<s%> with thee: neither will I <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> nor <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> with thee in this <S%H4725>place<s%>:

For it was <S%H1697>said<s%> to me by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, Thou shalt <S%H398>eat<s%> no <S%H3899>bread<s%> nor <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> there, nor turn <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> that thou <S%H1980>camest<s%>.

He <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, I am a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> also as thou art; and an <S%H4397>angel<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto me by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Bring him <S%H7725>back<s%> with thee into thine <S%H1004>house<s%>, that he may <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%>. But he <S%H3584>lied<s%> unto him.
So he went <S%H7725>back<s%> with him, and did <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> in his <S%H1004>house<s%>, and <S%H8354>drank<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%>.
¶ And it came to pass, as they <S%H3427>sat<s%> at the <S%H7979>table<s%>, that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came unto the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> that brought him <S%H7725>back<s%>:

And he <S%H7121>cried<s%> unto the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> that <S%H935>came<s%> from <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, Forasmuch <S%H3282>as<s%> thou hast <S%H4784>disobeyed<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and hast not <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> thee,

But camest <S%H7725>back<s%>, and hast <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H8354>drunk<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%>, of the which the LORD did <S%H1696>say<s%> to thee, <S%H398>Eat<s%> no <S%H3899>bread<s%>, and <S%H8354>drink<s%> no <S%H4325>water<s%>; thy <S%H5038>carcase<s%> shall not <S%H935>come<s%> unto the <S%H6913>sepulchre<s%> of thy <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

¶ And it came to pass, <S%H310>after<s%> he had <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%>, and <S%H310>after<s%> he had <S%H8354>drunk<s%>, that he <S%H2280>saddled<s%> for him the <S%H2543>ass<s%>, to wit, for the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> whom he had brought <S%H7725>back<s%>.

And when he was <S%H3212>gone<s%>, a <S%H738>lion<s%> <S%H4672>met<s%> him by the <S%H1870>way<s%>, and <S%H4191>slew<s%> him: and his <S%H5038>carcase<s%> was <S%H7993>cast<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%>, and the <S%H2543>ass<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H681>by<s%> it, the <S%H738>lion<s%> also <S%H5975>stood<s%> by the <S%H5038>carcase<s%>.

And, behold, <S%H582>men<s%> passed <S%H5674>by<s%>, and <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H5038>carcase<s%> <S%H7993>cast<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%>, and the <S%H738>lion<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> <S%H681>by<s%> the <S%H5038>carcase<s%>: and they <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H1696>told<s%> it in the <S%H5892>city<s%> where the <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%>.

And when the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> that brought him <S%H7725>back<s%> from the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> thereof, he <S%H559>said<s%>, It is the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, who was <S%H4784>disobedient<s%> unto the <S%H6310>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: therefore the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H5414>delivered<s%> him unto the <S%H738>lion<s%>, which hath <S%H7665>torn<s%> him, and <S%H4191>slain<s%> him, according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, which he <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto him.
And he <S%H1696>spake<s%> to his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H2280>Saddle<s%> me the <S%H2543>ass<s%>. And they <S%H2280>saddled<s%> him.

And he <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H4672>found<s%> his <S%H5038>carcase<s%> <S%H7993>cast<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%>, and the <S%H2543>ass<s%> and the <S%H738>lion<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> <S%H681>by<s%> the <S%H5038>carcase<s%>: the <S%H738>lion<s%> had not <S%H398>eaten<s%> the <S%H5038>carcase<s%>, nor <S%H7665>torn<s%> the <S%H2543>ass<s%>.

And the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> took <S%H5375>up<s%> the <S%H5038>carcase<s%> of the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H3240>laid<s%> it upon the <S%H2543>ass<s%>, and brought it <S%H7725>back<s%>: and the <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H5892>city<s%>, to <S%H5594>mourn<s%> and to <S%H6912>bury<s%> him.
And he <S%H3240>laid<s%> his <S%H5038>carcase<s%> in his own <S%H6913>grave<s%>; and they <S%H5594>mourned<s%> over him, saying, <S%H1945>Alas<s%>, my <S%H251>brother<s%>!

And it came to pass, <S%H310>after<s%> he had <S%H6912>buried<s%> him, that he <S%H559>spake<s%> to his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, When I am <S%H4191>dead<s%>, then <S%H6912>bury<s%> me in the <S%H6913>sepulchre<s%> wherein the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H6912>buried<s%>; <S%H3240>lay<s%> my <S%H6106>bones<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> his <S%H6106>bones<s%>:

For the <S%H1697>saying<s%> which he <S%H7121>cried<s%> by the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> against the <S%H4196>altar<s%> in <S%H1008>Beth-el<s%>, and against all the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the high <S%H1116>places<s%> which are in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>, shall surely come to pass.

¶ <S%H310>After<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> not from his <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%>, but <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> of the <S%H7098>lowest<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%> of the high <S%H1116>places<s%>: whosoever <S%H2655>would<s%>, he <S%H4390%H3027>consecrated<s%> him, and he became one of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> of the high <S%H1116>places<s%>.

And this <S%H1697>thing<s%> became <S%H2403>sin<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%>, even to cut it <S%H3582>off<s%>, and to <S%H8045>destroy<s%> it from off the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%>.
